message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,150,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget concerns. However, $900,000 is significantly below my minimum acceptable price.  I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000.  This still gives you a good deal considering the value you've mentioned, and it's the lowest I can go at this time.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $1,050,000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $1,025,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.
